reviewText: First off, this is PAL format and will NOT play on most US Players.  That said, this is essential viewing for all Cronenberg fans.  Not only is it fascinating to watch his evolution as a filmmaker through these four student films, they have all been beautifully restored.  I never even knew that From The Drain was in color!  But the casual viewer should be warned beforehand, they are  like most of Cronenbergs best work  definitely not for everyone.
